QuestData.Title: The Mantid Threat
QuestData.Description:
The mantid have been corrupting their kypari trees to imbue their amber with power from N'Zoth. The swarm is enough of a menace on its own. N'Zoth could transform them into something even more dire.
The Shado-Pan need to hear about this. I suggest you bring this information to your other allies as well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Stormspeaker Qian at the Silent Sanctuary.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Stormspeaker Qian at the Silent Sanctuary.
